text: Luigi Bernasconi (1910 - 1970) was an Italian ski jumper. He competed in the individual event at the 1928 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1970 deaths Category:Italian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Italy Category:Ski jumpers at the 1928 Winter Olympics Category:People from Graubünden
title: Luigi Bernasconi
